Class BallFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • BallFactory

  • public class BallFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates and controls all Balls on the GameArena when playing BallEater
    See Also:
    BallEater, Ball, GameArena

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BallFactory(BallEaterGame game) 
      BallFactory(int level, java.lang.String targetColour)
      constructor, generates a new BallFactory with a given level and BallEater colour (target colour)
      BallFactory(int level, java.lang.String targetColour, boolean isKids)
      constructor, generates a new (easier) BallFactory for kids with a given level and BallEater colour (target colour)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bounce()
      moves the balls in this BallFactory and checks for collisions against the edge of the GameArena, and other balls.
      void changeLevel(int level)
      changes the current level of this BallEater game
      void checkCollision(Ball b)
      checks for collisions between Balls and responds to these collisions.
      int checkCollision(BallEater b)
      checks for collisions between Balls and BallEater and responds to these collisions.
      void generateBalls(GameArena arena)
      generates the balls for this level and adds them to the GameArena
      void move()
      moves the Balls in this BallFactory according to their current speed
      void resetBalls()
      resets the Balls in the GameArena, removing the existing ones and generating new ones

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BallFactory

        public BallFactory(int level,
                   java.lang.String targetColour)
        constructor, generates a new BallFactory with a given level and BallEater colour (target colour)
        Parameters:
        level, - the game's current level (int 1-11)
        targetColour, - String representing the colour that the BallEater is able to eat

      • BallFactory

        public BallFactory(int level,
                   java.lang.String targetColour,
                   boolean isKids)
        constructor, generates a new (easier) BallFactory for kids with a given level and BallEater colour (target colour)
        Parameters:
        level, - the game's current level (int 1-11)
        targetColour, - String representing the colour that the BallEater is able to eat
        isKids, - boolean declaring whether the game is in kids' mode

      • BallFactory

        public BallFactory(BallEaterGame game)

    • Method Detail

      • generateBalls

        public void generateBalls(GameArena arena)
        generates the balls for this level and adds them to the GameArena
        Parameters:
        arena, - the GameArena

      • changeLevel

        public void changeLevel(int level)
        changes the current level of this BallEater game
        Parameters:
        level, - integer between 1 and 11.

      • resetBalls

        public void resetBalls()
        resets the Balls in the GameArena, removing the existing ones and generating new ones

      • checkCollision

        public int checkCollision(BallEater b)
        checks for collisions between Balls and BallEater and responds to these collisions.
        Parameters:
        b, - the BallEater to check against
        Returns:
        ballsRemaining

      • checkCollision

        public void checkCollision(Ball b)
        checks for collisions between Balls and responds to these collisions. Note that collisions between Balls do not obey proper laws of physics!
        Parameters:
        b, - the Ball object to check against

      • move

        public void move()
        moves the Balls in this BallFactory according to their current speed

      • bounce

        public void bounce()
        moves the balls in this BallFactory and checks for collisions against the edge of the GameArena, and other balls.
